display_long_description:
Welcome to join our community, communicate with developers, and receive the next work discount code: https://discord.gg/UXPYzEaTPT
# Game Introduction
《Magic Essence: Ether Gems》 is a magical puzzle game about a young apprentice whose use of a powerful wizard's staff splits the world into three spaces. Players traverse these spaces, gathering gems and solving puzzles to repair reality. The apprentice grows on this journey, learning responsibility and self-development through his mistakes.
[media]






# Game Features

Hand Tracking: 

use two hands and the virtual world interaction. Each movement is based on the precise control of the manual hand movement, enhanced sense of substitution, further free space exploration and creation, unlimited fusion of the real world and the virtual world.
[media]





Triple Space Switching: 

Interactively switch between three unique spaces, large, medium, and small, bringing a wonderful puzzle-solving experience.
[media]




 Well-designed puzzles: 

Combine observation and logical reasoning, use spatial changes and material characteristics to gradually solve complex puzzles and find the whereabouts of the gems.
[media]




Magic World: 

Exquisite graphics and sound effects create a strong magical atmosphere and take you into a fantasy adventure world.
[media]


Immersive experience: 

Feel the impact of every action and decision through exquisite interactions and real physical effects.
[media]

# Game Features

Hand Tracking: 

use two hands and the virtual world interaction. Each movement is based on the precise control of the manual hand movement, enhanced sense of substitution, further free space exploration and creation, unlimited fusion of the real world and the virtual world.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75647715_522094727389660_897183004715557754_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DnB8VJkG7zMQ7kNvwF05wB3&_nc_oc=Adm8evcKPAfIeJntxSroDEpXzcmXW5ORbmLN-qb9MV8Yq8utbija8KH8zRQsNl0MFfc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bhCwCqs5no0XiNWHGFyO3g&oh=00_AfudM8-9N55iWxRN8EMKXs-PqiklUN2gPJ4fUSCPmOJwmQ&oe=6995D27E)





Triple Space Switching:

Combine observation and logical reasoning, use spatial changes and material characteristics to gradually solve complex puzzles and find the whereabouts of the gems.
